name: kite
description: Python coding assistant featuring AI-powered autocompletions, advanced function signatures, and instant documentation

scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && apm install && rm -rf dist && npm run build-prod
scripts.clean-dev-install: apm unlink && rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && apm install && rm -rf dist && npm run build-dev && apm link

showJSBetaNotification.title: Show JavaScript beta notification
showJSBetaNotification.description: Whether or not to show the JavaScript beta notification.

showGoBetaNotification.title: Show Go beta notification
showGoBetaNotification.description: Whether or not to show the Go beta notification.

showWelcomeNotificationOnStartup.title: Show welcome notification on startup
showWelcomeNotificationOnStartup.description: Whether or not to show the Kite welcome notification on startup.

enableCompletions.title: Enable completions
enableCompletions.description: Automatically show completions from Kite as you type.

enableHoverUI.title: Enable hover
enableHoverUI.description: Show a quick summary of a symbol when you hover your mouse over it.

maxVisibleSuggestionsAlongSignature.title: Completions limit with function signature
maxVisibleSuggestionsAlongSignature.description: Maximum number of completions that can be shown when a function signature is also shown.

loggingLevel.title: Logging level
loggingLevel.description: The verbosity level of Kite logs.

pollingInterval.title: Polling interval
pollingInterval.description: Interval in milliseconds at which the Kite package polls Kite Engine to get the status of the current file.

developerMode.title: Developer mode
developerMode.description: Displays JSON data from Kite Engine that's used when rendering a UI element.

startKiteAtStartup.title: Start Kite Engine on startup
startKiteAtStartup.description: Automatically start Kite Engine on editor startup if it's not already running.

signatureKwargsVisible.title: Show function keyword arguments
signatureKwargsVisible.description: Show inferred keyword arguments for a function when the function signature panel is shown

signaturePopularPatternsVisible.title: Show function call examples
signaturePopularPatternsVisible.description: Show examples on how to call a function when the function signature panel is shown
